column3: Can you tell me the time please?
I want to get to the airport. Can you tell me how to get there?
I think I can take the bus there. Do you know where the nearest bus stop is?
Hello sir. welcome to the restaurant. How many?
Right this way. Please have a seat. Your waiter will be with you in a moment.
Hello sir. hello ma'am. Would you like to order now?
What would you like to drink?
We have bottled water juice and coffee.
I'll have a bottle of water please.
What would you like to eat?
I'll have a Veg sandwich and a bowl of tomato soup.
Hey John. How have you been?
I am good. It has been a long time
Yes it has. What is going on with you?
I have been pretty busy with work.
